question: The Western Australian government signed a new 4 billion dollar contract with BHP this morning.
whyCorrect: No primary source confirms this. Check official government and BHP press rooms like [WA Government Media](https://www.wa.gov.au/government/announcements) and [BHP Newsroom](https://www.bhp.com/news).
whyIncorrect: Viral posts often recycle old or fabricated headlines. **Verify** with authoritative sources and follow links to original documents.
